name: The Pop Rock
description:
8” & 8.5” Pop Rock
There has been a large demand for standard street decks and with that being said I have decided to build my dream popsicle stick. Each board is pressed individually in a cold press. This ensures greater accuracy for a more perfect concave. The concave is deep and it provides a strong responsive pop. Seeing as it is made from the best Canadian Maple it can also withstand tremendous abuse. Lots of pop and hard as a rock, I have decided to name this gem, “The Pop Rock.” Available in 7.75", 8” and 8.5” widths.

+Handmade in the U.S.A
+Deck Only
+Subtle Screen Print

name: The Street Sweeper
description:
Modeled after the skateboards of the 60’s and early 70’s, the Street Sweeper is a unique board that is sure to turn heads. This isn't some crappy little piece of plastic. It's a powerful cruiser that pivots sharp and fast around turns and is great for the park, street, or campus. Busting out clean and classic slides or freeriding is certainly within the realm of possibility for the Street Sweeper. Each board is handcrafted from 7 plys of Canadian Maple and is pressed with a medium concave, kick tail, and very subtle nose. Even the board’s rails pay tribute to the yesteryears of skateboarding with flat walls instead of the more modern rounded edges. These flat rails hold up and retain their shape longer than rounded edges and are stronger when exposed to abusive elements like curbs. Just buy it, it's my favorite board.

+Silk-screened Graphic.
+7 Plys of Canadian Maple.
+Classic craftsmanship.
+Old School & New School Truck Patterns
+32" L x 8.5" W

Hardware:
+65mm Orangatang Fat Free wheels 80a
+Gullwing Mission Trucks or Standard 150 mm Longboard Trucks
+Abec 9 Bearings/Spacers
+Jessup grip tape.
+1/4" Risers

name: The DH Hiro
description:
The DH Hiro is a CNC'd board built for stability and speed. Constructed with the finest maple in North America the DH Hiro is manufactured with pinpoint precision and accuracy. Features artwork designed by yours truly.

Specs:

10" x 39"
29" WB Inner bolts
Radial concave
9 ply maple
Precision CNC'd wheel wells and manufacturing

name: Tiny Dancer v.2
description:
You don’t have to be a ballerina to enjoy this all new version of our favorite dancing longboard. With an all new shape and strategically placed wheel wells this board is something out of the Endless Summer. You’ll be cross-stepping, peter-panning, and nose-walking everywhere you go. Flat as a pancake and strong as a bull, this shortened cruising and dancing board is an awesome blend of old school surfing and modern freeriding. The Tiny Dancer V.2 retains a smaller board length and affordable price while still providing an amazing mobile dance floor. As the BeeGees would say, “You should be dancing…”

Specs:
43" x 8.5"
11ply Baltic Birch

Hardware:
Orangatang 65mm 80a Fat Free Wheels
Standard longboard trucks 180mm
Jessup grip tape
Abec 9 bearings

name: The Swift Tee
description: Artwork designed and printed on an American made tee. Screened in the basement.
